analyzed: ▁dhamma pacc anīy ānulom a ▁tik aduk apaṭṭhānapāḷi

original: Nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: ▁na saṃkiliṭṭh asaṃkilesik aṃ ▁nahetu ṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁a saṃkiliṭṭh asaṃkilesik o ▁hetu ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁saṃkhittaṃ

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke cha …pe… avigate nava.
